Job Description
About the Team
Our team builds scalable and highly relevant search functionality for the entire Workday product family using the latest technologies and patterns. Using Elasticsearch(and Lucene at its core), we power search for the hundreds of thousands of users and provide real-time visibility into data. We take pride in delivering robust functionality in a collaborative and energetic environment. We strive for creativity, embracing agile development, extensive automated testing, continuous deployment and service ownership.
About the Role
We are looking for skilled and enthusiastic software engineers to be part of our dynamic team to make a difference in developing the search platform and services used by Fortune 500 companies.This role requires strong skills in design, development, testing, release, support and enhancement of highly visible / customer-facing software using an agile development methodology.  You will collaborate with product management and development team members to define and drive solutions and track deadlines.
About You
5-8+ years of experience delivering reliable, scalable and high-quality production software across distributed systems
BS in Computer Science or related fields required
Strong understanding of object-oriented design and programming required
5+ years experience in at least one programming language (e.g. Java, Scala, C++, etc.)
Prior experience working with service-oriented / microservice-based paradigms and technologies
Passion for building high-volume software systems and owning it from conceptual design and development thru deployment and production phases
Collaborative and comfortable working in a fast-paced environment
3+ years experience with search engines (e.g. Elasticsearch, Solr, and/or Lucene) and performance tuning
Strong communication skills
Preferred Qualifications
Experience with or understanding of Search and Relevance techniques
Experience with or understanding of search and relevance techniques
Knowledge in SQL
Experience with distributed streaming platforms such as Kafka, Spark, Hadoop or similar open-source frameworks
Experience with cloud-based architecture (e.g. Amazon Web Services)
